title: december 23: the ear of van gogh
description:
Today on 365 days with mxmtoon, Maia talks about Vincent van Gogh, and the unfortunate time that he cut off part of his own ear. She also talks about a strange incident involving one of the Beatles and a down on their luck musician. Join this episode today and make sure you’re following along with the daily updates @365daysmxmtoon on all platforms.
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit megaphone.fm/adchoices
